msg: HDFS-2416. distcp with a webhdfs uri on a secure cluster fails.

author: marvin
msg: LUCY-185 Detect missing required args better.
The XS argument processing code should be detecting when required arguments
are not supplied and throwing meaningful exceptions, but under some
circumstances it fails, resulting in invalid input being passed to core
functions (and typically a segfault).  Fix this by iterating over all possible
